search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Postscript (postscript-1.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for Postscript is: [https://postscript.io/pricing/](https://postscript.io/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
Flexible pricing, no hidden fees
--------------------------------

![Image 1: SMS Marketing](https://images.ctfassets.net/mpv16aisnpdx/6tgtfz4NBC5CA27VJaMA9J/7a5a67535a9e7a95685d716823bd617b/SMS_Marketing.png)

### Starter

##### $0/mo, $25 monthly minimum spend

##### Brands just getting started with SMS

$0.015/SMS, $0.045/MMS + Carrier fees\*

[Start Free Trial](https://postscript.io/try-postscript)

##### Features:

*   Campaigns and automations
    
*   Unlimited segments
    
*   Dedicated toll-free number
    
*   Reporting
    

*   Integrations
    
*   Subscriber acquisition tools, with 2 opt-in Keywords
    
*   Help center access
    

### Growth

##### $100/mo

##### Brands building up their SMS program

$0.01/SMS, $0.03/MMS + Carrier fees\*

[Start Free Trial](https://postscript.io/try-postscript)

##### Features from Starter, plus:

*   Unlimited opt-in Keywords
    

*   Live chat and email support
    

### Professional

##### $500/mo

Most Popular

##### Established brands scaling up SMS as a top revenue channel

$0.007/SMS, $0.024/MMS + Carrier fees\*

[Start Free Trial](https://postscript.io/try-postscript)

##### Features from Growth, plus:

*   Onboarding Launch Specialist
    
*   Priority live chat/email support
    

*   API access for custom integrations
    
*   "Powered by Postscript" removed from opt-in
    
*   Branded short link subdomain
    
*   Tier 1 engineering support
    

##### Everything from Professional, plus:

*   Send personalized messages with custom product recommendations
    

*   Priority live chat support (2-min response time during business hours)
    
*   Data Warehouse Push
    

### All Postscript Marketing plans come with:

*   Built-in Automation templates for Abandoned Cart, Welcome Series, Browse Abandonment, Upsell, Shipping Notifications, and more
    
*   Subscriber acquisition tools (including popups, checkout collection, opt-in form, and more)
    

*   Advanced segmentation using your Shopify data
    
*   Visual flow builder
    
*   Analytics and reports on subscribers, revenue, and messaging performance
    

*   Response management (reply to texts from subscribers)
    
*   Custom attribution windows
    
*   Custom contact card
    

**\* Average US Carrier fees are .00289 for SMS and .00758 for MMS & Listed Rates are for US - 50 States/Canada only**

![Image 2: Postscript AI logo - light](https://images.ctfassets.net/mpv16aisnpdx/4Qqj5soxO5aIlr4fQWMVQE/7c7023870a708ca319622d235d37803e/postscript_ai_logo_dark_4x.webp)

### Infinity Testing

##### Contact us

Beta

Infinity Testing is available for brands on SMS Marketing. It is currently in beta. For pricing and eligibility, contact our team.

[Contact Sales for Beta Pricing](https://postscript.io/book-a-demo-ai)

##### Included in AI Infinity Testing

*   Access to Postscript’s Brand Center
    
*   Custom AI Dashboards and Analytics
    

*   Setup and strategy support
    
*   Early access to upcoming AI features
    

![Image 3: SMS Sales Badge](https://images.ctfassets.net/mpv16aisnpdx/6vS1Bcs2kxRSD8hUs0wXkb/aa92183506315b5f323e469d9e8a8a07/SMS_Sales_Badge_White.svg)

### SMS Sales

##### $0/mo, $25 monthly minimum spend

SMS Sales is available as an add-on for brands using SMS Marketing. For pricing and availability, contact our team.

[Contact Sales for Custom Pricing](https://postscript.io/smssales-request)

##### All new offering from Postscript!

*   Team of US-based SMS Sales Associates
    
*   7-days a week coverage
    
*   Custom sales flows & playbooks
    

*   Regular check-ins with your SMS Sales team
    
*   AI-powered Response Automation
    
*   Conversation Intelligence
    

18,000+ Shopify stores prefer Postscript
----------------------------------------

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

Yes! When you start a free trial, you’ll receive a credit equal to $1,000 that you can use during your first 30 days.

This credit applies toward message and carrier fees. If you exhaust your credit before your trial ends or at the end of your first 30 days, you will be charged at the Free package rate for any additional messages sent (unless you select a different package).

During your trial, you will be able to build two unique keywords, set up automations, send out marketing campaigns, create segments, leverage integrations, and respond to customers. We want you kick the tires on our software as much as possible.

Have a current subscriber list that you’d like to bring over for your trial? Check out [this article](https://help.postscript.io/hc/en-us/articles/9878600494107-Upload-an-Existing-SMS-Subscriber-List) for how to upload that list.

Ready to make SMS your #1 revenue channel?
------------------------------------------

Postscript has plans to help you scale your Shopify store with SMS. All plans start with a free 30-day trial and come with a 4x ROI guarantee for businesses.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Carrier fees are additional and vary by region.

Flexible pricing, no hidden fees
--------------------------------

### Growth

##### Brands building up their SMS program

[Start Free Trial](https://postscript.io/try-postscript)

##### Features from Starter, plus:

*   Unlimited opt-in Keywords
    

*   Live chat and email support
    

### Professional

### All Postscript Marketing plans come with:

*   Built-in Automation templates for Abandoned Cart, Welcome Series, Browse Abandonment, Upsell, Shipping Notifications, and more
    
*   Subscriber acquisition tools (including popups, checkout collection, opt-in form, and more)
    

*   Advanced segmentation using your Shopify data
    
*   Visual flow builder
    
*   Analytics and reports on subscribers, revenue, and messaging performance
    

*   Response management (reply to texts from subscribers)
    
*   Custom attribution windows
    
*   Custom contact card

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

Yes! When you start a free trial, you’ll receive a credit equal to $1,000 that you can use during your first 30 days.

This credit applies toward message and carrier fees. If you exhaust your credit before your trial ends or at the end of your first 30 days, you will be charged at the Free package rate for any additional messages sent (unless you select a different package).

During your trial, you will be able to build two unique keywords, set up automations, send out marketing campaigns, create segments, leverage integrations, and respond to customers. We want you kick the tires on our software as much as possible.

Have a current subscriber list that you’d like to bring over for your trial? Check out [this article](https://help.postscript.io/hc/en-us/articles/9878600494107-Upload-an-Existing-SMS-Subscriber-List) for how to upload that list.

Ready to make SMS your #1 revenue channel?
------------------------------------------

Postscript has plans to help you scale your Shopify store with SMS. All plans start with a free 30-day trial and come with a 4x ROI guarantee for businesses.
